body_html: The issues is still valid I guess. On our end we solved it by using the Dataset interface provided in Tensorflow, which served our needs more. It seems the original code simply did not take into account that used datasets can be lots bigger than what they used.

body: The issues is still valid I guess. On our end we solved it by using the Dataset interface provided in Tensorflow, which served our needs more. It seems the  original code simply did not take into account that used datasets can be lots bigger than what they used.
